mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gold_data (bas_dd, isu_cd, isu_nm, tdd_cls_prc, cmp_prev_dd_prc, fluc_rt, tdd_opn_prc, tdd_hg_prc, tdd_lw_prc, acc_trd_vol, acc_trd_val) VALUES
(#{goldData.basDd}, #{goldData.isuCd}, #{goldData.isuNm}, #{goldData.tddClsPrc}, #{goldData.cmpPrevDdPrc}, #{goldData.flucRt}, #{goldData.tddOpnPrc}, #{goldData.tddHgPrc}, #{goldData.tddLwPrc}, #{goldData.accTrdVol}, #{goldData.accTrdVal})
